website_summaries.verdict: The response towards the Fresh Foam Crag Trail has been mixed to positive. People report that this New Balance trail running shoe is versatile and attractive. Aside from the looks, the underfoot platform and the outsole are also highlighted as the elements that help with this product’s effectiveness and consumer appeal. On the other hand, the one-piece opening has become the source of ire because of its restrictive build and not-so-stretchy design.Fans of off-road performance shoes are the ones to enjoy the New Balance Fresh Foam Crag Trail.
pros: Several purchasers have lauded the appealing color schemes of the New Balance Fresh Foam Crag Trail
The price of this trail running shoe is praised for being wallet-friendly
Most consumers raise their thumbs in affirmation of the relatively lightweight structure of this New Balance running shoe
Some say that the underfoot platform is able to steady the foot and maintain balance on uneven terrains
The traction capacity of the outsole is acknowledged by people who like agreeable surface control
The general durability of the materials is considered dependable and adherent to expectations
cons: Several testers claim that the New Balance Fresh Foam Crag Trail is hard to put on because of the one-piece opening
The lack of a tongue unit has been lamented by some runners because it made the in-shoe experience a bit tight
A few people have reported a tendency of the upper’s fabrics to rub uncomfortably against the skin of the foot

customer_reviews.title: Slipper design (no tongue)
customer_reviews.text: Unlike regular running shoes, this shoe has a "slipper" design. There is no tongue, and the laces are decorative. That means you need to use a shoehorn to get these shoes on. That was not apparent from the description. That's not what I was looking for, so I am returning these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Jason O Dueck

customer_reviews.title: LIKE CLOUDS FOR THE FEET!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is on his feet almost all day when working- that's a lot of standing on really hard flooring (concrete & metal) and he was coming home often with foot pain UNTIL he wore these shoes. He ABSOLUTELY LOVES them. I knew he would so I bought him 2 pairs because Amazon had a temporary price reduction on them and it was worth it to get him a backup pair. He says they are super comfortable and when he comes home, his feet don't hurt at all. As for fit, my husband is typically a 9 in most sneakers, depending on the model/MFR but in New Balance and these CRAG V1's he's a 9 1/2. They fit him perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Retrohobbit

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, Lightweight, Super Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Great snug fit, not too snug either. I’m a really big heavy guy and I bought these for everyday walking around use. Super comfortable and light weight! Will definitely be ordering another pair. If you are a person that likes to leave your laces tied and just slip in and out of your shoes, then these are for you. I actually love not having a tongue that gets in the way.
customer_reviews.author: J.Buras

customer_reviews.title: Refunded, kinda
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these shoes with a big smile on my face and was super excited I because I liked the color-way. Received the shoes and they were not true to size and quite frankly didn’t look the same as in pictures. I returned them without issues but was refunded with an online amazon prime gift card. So the money I barely had for the shoes to begin with, is only able to be used for amazon purchases. How is that even a thing?
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit & Wear
customer_reviews.text: I have a wide foot and didn't want to spend a fortune on a new pair of trail shoes. I bought these and wore them for a few workouts. Loved them so much, I came back and bought another three pairs. Once you find a good shoe, it can be hard to find them when you wear out the pair. I figured I would store the others and pull them out as needed!
customer_reviews.author: Good Brews Guy

customer_reviews.title: Great at first...
customer_reviews.text: I’m changing my initial review which was all kudos for the great look and comfort of the shoe...and both were true. However, after only a couple of weeks, the leather piece covering the shoelaces, the eyelets, have already broken. Fortunately, it is mostly for appearances and doesn’t affect the stability of the laces, but just doesn’t look as sharp. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Crazy comfy, look awesome, crappy materials
customer_reviews.text: I have worn these 3-4 days a week and they are by far my most comfortable everyday shoe. Pros: machine washable. And they come out looking amazing. I have thrown these in my washing machine probably 4 times. Just be sure to remove the insole before washing and AIR DRY. Cons: The fabric at the flex point in the front of the shoe is DISINTEGRATING. It felt a little cheap when they were new, but the looked awesome. So crappy fabric over the toe-bix, but insanely comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Wasatchback

customer_reviews.title: Not Enough Toe Room In Wide
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 13 wide. My foot is probably a 12.5 Wide. The inner curve of the toe area doesn't give quite enough room. The grey color and white dot design is good. I liked the material. An issue is the rubber heel piece grabs onto my pants repeatedly and makes a noise. The footbed is pretty cushy and neutral. No heel problems. If there is any problem with a shoe I have to send it back, and this one had two for me. These were an almost, so they will probably work for someone else.
customer_reviews.author: John Dandell

customer_reviews.title: The fit is great. Like walking on sure ground.!
customer_reviews.text: I have nothing negative to say. These have become my favorite pair for now. Thankyou Amazon
customer_reviews.author: MoneyWatch Quality in mind.

customer_reviews.title: Go the distance without realizing it
customer_reviews.text: Grip like no other. Ran 2 miles and when I hit my turn around point I couldn’t believe that I was already there. Could have run 2 more. Very pleased to find a shoe that fits as I am flat footed.
customer_reviews.author: Mike h

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite shoe
customer_reviews.text: Stable good fitting shoe with just the right amount of cushioning. The only negative on these shoes is the toe box is ok but could be taller for my preference. These shoes are not wide or sloppy so if you have a wide foot make sure you order the wide size. These shoes do come with a cheap neutral foam insert that gives zero arch support but I place super feet inserts in all my shoes for a custom fit so it makes a difference in arch support.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel W

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfy But Make Your Feet SWEAT!
customer_reviews.text: I use these shoes for my job since I am on my feet all day long running around. The only problem I have is that because of the material they don't breathe enough to keep your feet from sweating. Now I am not a guy who has issues with my feet sweating but everyone knows sweaty feet causes STINKY FEET and that's the only issue with these shoes. Great shoe but they make my feet sweat. Something non of my other shoes make my feet do.
customer_reviews.author: JMill1981

customer_reviews.title: Love these Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: No tongue seems to be a problem for some. I find them to be perfect because there is no tongue to roll off the top of your foot. I can pull these on already tied but if you need them snug just unlace and then re-lace. Super comfy and light. Getting a second pair!
customer_reviews.author: Skid Lid

customer_reviews.title: Good value but not very durable
customer_reviews.text: Good: Comfortable, easy to take on and off, good fit, looks nice. Bad: Low quality materials. They seem very fragile and cheaply made. Also, the rubber is not very grippy. I would not trust these for actual trail running or serious outdoor use. Summary: For around $40 these are good value for a shoe to wear around town but do not expect a durable trail runner.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: REAL thick , REAL Soft, Fits as expected
customer_reviews.text: Cushioning was better than expected , I went on a run with these earlier today and was very comfortable, tread was very grippy although I don’t do harsh trails, mostly park runs. The soles are SUPER thick, which I like , if you like thin soled foot strength focused shoes look elsewhere . I run about a mile and a half 3 times a week with these and I don't have too much trouble with them,no rubbing or chafing. Walking with them is just as smooth or even better, had them for about three months now and I would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: Bill Foldberg

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit New Balance great quality
customer_reviews.text: I only use New Balance for my everyday brisk walk, also walking shoes. The slip-on design on this model is fine, nothing to complain. As always the 11.5 (2E wide), comfortable on every New Balance I buy....... so far.
customer_reviews.author: GUS

customer_reviews.title: Great trail shoe
customer_reviews.text: I love hiking in these. They have great traction and are super bouncy thanks to the fresh foam. I have the brown ones so they also match with my camping/hiking gear. Putting them on is a bit awkward because of the shape, but that doesn't really bother me since I enjoy wearing them so much. Would definitely buy again. Slightly snug so you won't go wrong ordering a half size up depending on how you like your shoe to fit.
customer_reviews.author: Kaleb H

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to slide foot in - back I’d show suppler is pushed in and runs up against heel all day - you can actually see the divot on back of shoe - Horrible purchase - I will forever be “Off Balance “” in the future. #asics want a new customer ?
customer_reviews.author: kandykanekan

customer_reviews.title: Cushion, but tongue is made connected to the shoe ( slip on ).
customer_reviews.text: Cushiony but if you normally get a wide, I would recommend getting a wide. Don't take the chance, the toe box is a little narrower than most new balance. Also the tongue is not separate from the shoe, it's a slip on. Other than that it's a good shoe for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sportek for life

customer_reviews.title: Light and comfy.. good for everyday work or light hikes
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are super light... it’s a slip on type shoe. I’m a size 7.5 but ordered a size 8. Great show for work or even hiking. I walk on gravel all day. Wouldn’t over pay for these though. Overall good show and comfy
customer_reviews.author: NewJerz

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor activity shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and design of the shoe. The sole is solid enough for hiking in rugged terrain but still comfortable. The suede look and color are stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck C

customer_reviews.title: Kinda small. Returned.
customer_reviews.text: Too small, although I bought same size I have used for half a dozen other New Balance running shows. Returned with no hassle whatsoever. Wasn’t quite motivated enough to try a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer in Hawaii

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love these sneaks. I work in them 10 hrs/5 days a week on roofs and ladders. My feet thank me every day.
customer_reviews.author: Mclumber

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and durable
customer_reviews.text: The reviews I've read or complaints about a slip-on type shoe, but if you know your feet and can use slip-on type shoes these are great. There is no pressure at the tongue you can actually use the laces to get a snug fit. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable. Fit perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I've worn New Balance for decades because they fit well and last a long time. I wear a 15 and often have trouble finding shoes locally. Glad to have found these on Amazon. Love how they look and fit.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to put on. These have a neoprene feel and they don’t breathe well. These are the worst new balance sneakers I have ever bought. Spend the money and get the 997h. These shoes suck.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Berdy

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes but...
customer_reviews.text: Loved the design of the shoes and they are super comfortable but the heel portion of the shoe digs into my Achilles heel making them uncomfortable at times.
customer_reviews.author: Matt G

customer_reviews.title: Great trail running / hiking shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great trail running/hiking shoe for our son. He says they are very comfortable and didn’t even have to break them in
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: VERY COMFORTABLE FOR WALKING AND HIKING
customer_reviews.text: I have been a NB shoe buyer for quite some time, and this is my first running shoe. I don't run, but this shoe is very comfortable for hiking and walking. Perfect fit and somewhat water proof.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Knight

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. They are very comfortable like running shoes but sturdy enough to hike, etc.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Decent- front of the shoe is wide
customer_reviews.text: The shoes have great tread especially if you are hiking. They stuck to anything I was pretty impressed. That being said the front of the shoe in front of the laces is kinda big and you can’t make it any tighter with the laces so I don’t like how much room there is up there to move around while the rest of the shoe feels normal. I’m going to try thick socks
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: No tongue opening on shoes.
customer_reviews.text: The tongue of the shoes were sewn in place and as a result the openings were to small to get my foot in the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Arch J Martin

customer_reviews.title: Best Running Shoe for a Big Man
customer_reviews.text: Best running/walking shoe for a 6’7” man. Lots of cushion and very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: CJDal

customer_reviews.title: THIRD PAIR
customer_reviews.text: These are my new go to trail runners. I'm most certainly a satisfied customer! I put about 160 miles on them per month; they start to break down around three months. Be sure to order 1/2 size larger than what you normally wear.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Solid ankle support area, soft sole comfort....yet not too soft for running. Great shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Gnomestead

customer_reviews.title: This show is good looking and it has multiple uses
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves them I have bought 3 pairs He wears then for nice and for work he like them be cause saw dust and lawn clippings do not fall in shoes because the younger and shoe are one piece Great shoes
customer_reviews.author: inka

customer_reviews.title: Good quality shoe
customer_reviews.text: Well made shoe, great price. I cannot wear no show socks with it however, but that may just be me.
customer_reviews.author: 605Btimes2

customer_reviews.title: Not made like a typical shoe
customer_reviews.text: More of a slipperThan a shoe also it had no tongue.
customer_reviews.author: CV

customer_reviews.title: nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: they look nice and fit fine .built well enough for my needs
customer_reviews.author: The Ultimate Snagger

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fit and support
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these! I bought him these for his birthday hoping he would like them and they would fit. They fit perfectly and he said they are very comfortable and have a great amount of support.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley H

customer_reviews.title: Good some whst
customer_reviews.text: Always a good show brand! update it's now been 6 months sides where shoestrings go one shoe already busting never had a problem in new balance like this
customer_reviews.author: galen   wilson

customer_reviews.title: Just ok🤷🏿‍♂️
customer_reviews.text: I didn't really like how they fit nor how they look on my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Stark

customer_reviews.title: Great for wide feet!
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are wide enough for 6inch width foot. The only things that didn't seem as good as we thought was the foam in it. My son states it doesn't feel any different than a regular shoe. He loves foam inserts.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Y.

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit well, look nice and are lighter than expected. Very pleased with my purchase Nice shoes
customer_reviews.author: jerry klus

customer_reviews.title: Check the box before sending please!
customer_reviews.text: Not only did they send two left shoes but one was not even the right size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: these are light and comfortable, the fit is good, they are a little hard to get on without a shoehorn
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable; great quality and price.
customer_reviews.text: Fits great, true to size. These shoes are very comfortable and wear well in light rain and snow. The blue/grey color scheme goes well with about any outfit.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Jones

customer_reviews.title: Fits well, tight to slip on.
customer_reviews.text: Nice and light trail runner, using for disc golf. As per other reviews, definitely tough to slip on as tongue is attached. If you tight too tightly the laces can cut into the top of your foot due to the thin and stretchy tongue. Fits well and works well once you dial in your lacing.
customer_reviews.author: can't say

customer_reviews.title: well built  too tight, should have ordered 4E but that was not a choice
customer_reviews.text: I like them, use them for bike riding but too tight, 2E, need a 4E Other than that, they are nice; I just have very wide feet & that is why I wear New Balance 4E
customer_reviews.author: Daniel M. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Dang these are comfy
customer_reviews.text: Really like so far , feels like I'm walking on a thick foam pad all day
customer_reviews.author: CO5280

customer_reviews.title: Good on concrete in a box store environment.
customer_reviews.text: I walk 10 miles per day in the course of my job. A quality liner and these shoes hold up as well as an upper end hiking boot (Columbia, New Balance, etc...).
customer_reviews.author: shaun mcgarry

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: First pair of New Balance in a long time. Very comfortable and very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: anthony ross

customer_reviews.title: The so called sock fit doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Sock fit is ridiculously too tight count even get it over my shoe product looks great but i would never buy again
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than the store size
customer_reviews.text: I returned one pair of shoes for being too small. However, when we go to the New Balance store close to my house the same size shoe always fits. Disappointed because he really liked them.
customer_reviews.author: A.S.

customer_reviews.title: faulty
customer_reviews.text: actually really like this shoe but the leather cover the laces ripped after 4 or 5 times wearing the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the purchase. They are very comfortable, they ran a little wide for me but not so wide that it is a deal breaker. All in all very happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Bebhihn

customer_reviews.title: Comphy Hikers!
customer_reviews.text: If you want something a little more comfortable than a big pair of hiking boots, give these a try. I've worn them on some pretty aggressive hikes and they were plenty sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Guay

customer_reviews.title: Great for flat feet.
customer_reviews.text: My son loved these shoes. He is flat footed and has back problems. The shoes fit great and are extremely comfortable. Will buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: They fit great, I love the design with ripstop material. Super comfortable, no tongue but are still easy to get on.
customer_reviews.author: chuck dugger

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for wide feet.
customer_reviews.text: The only thing wrong with this shoe is when your feet start to sweat they squeak a little bit. Just put some baby power or foot powder under the insert and youre good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Vinny

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: I like the fitted feel around the ankle when putting my foot in. Feels like it wouldn't fall off even if I didn't lace them up. Only dislike, would've liked memory foam in them.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: What were they thinking?
customer_reviews.text: There's no way to get this shoe on a foot. Any foot.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Danann

customer_reviews.title: Good fit and good traction outdoors or indoors
customer_reviews.text: The snug fit of the shoe is a plus whether they are tied or not. Keeps my foot well secured if I decide to do vigorous activity in these trail runners outside or even inside on some field turf!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Weird tongue too narrow
customer_reviews.text: Theres no tongue, and they are too narrow. Barely get my feet in them.
customer_reviews.author: jacob ishman

customer_reviews.title: Buying a second pair for hikes.
customer_reviews.text: Very light. Very comfortable. Very breathable. I love these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Mauricio

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable as can be
customer_reviews.text: Love them, the people giving poor reviews are some crybabies that probably live to bitc# about everything. They're comfortable as can be and exactly as described
customer_reviews.author: Chris Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Love the comfort
customer_reviews.text: Little tight to get on but goes and fits my wide feet
customer_reviews.author: DMtchm

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable and perfect fit for size Mens size18 Wide
customer_reviews.text: My husband beloved this shoe! He has a side door in size 18 so it is very difficult to find comfortable shoes for him. These are super comfortable, light weighted and fit perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Chef Jill

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, little tough to slide foot in, but can be done. Has a "Jean" look
customer_reviews.author: Alex Sturm

customer_reviews.title: New Balance. Just great shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Look great, fit great, exactly what I expected from New Balance.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Register

customer_reviews.title: Fits well easy to take off and put on.
customer_reviews.text: The shoe lace system in these shoes makes it easy to slip on and slip off.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy J. Borchert

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: I like the product but it is a size to small, can u help me return shoe for the proper size thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my boyfriend. He loves them and they look good.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda cumpston

customer_reviews.title: They were small
customer_reviews.text: This product was too tight even though I ordered a wide width
customer_reviews.author: Horatio Henry

customer_reviews.title: They were delivered before the holidaysThank you Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: Order was there on time and the shoes fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: angela randolph

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my husband and he LOVES them!
customer_reviews.author: Alyx

customer_reviews.title: Fit true to size
customer_reviews.text: I like the fit, they are very comfortable, my pair came a bit scratched up not pleased or happy with that
customer_reviews.author: ruben

product_meta.title: New Balance Men's Crag V1 Fresh Foam Trail Running Shoe
product_meta.description: Pull on the Fresh foam Crag running shoes and hit the trails. With a trail-inspired silhouette and data-driven trail technology built in, these shoes are bound to become your new favorites for hiking, off-road running and more. These trail running shoes are ultra-comfortable and built to give you more traction when you need it most. These comfortable running shoes are designed with a bootie construction and attached tongue for an effortless slip-on fit and feel. This leads to a distraction-free run on the trails. Spend less time shifting and fixing your shoes, and more time on the run. The two proprietary technologies built into these runners are made to provide you with more comfort and grip for a smoother running experience. Fresh foam cushioning in the midsole delivers an ultra-cushioned, lightweight ride. At tread at the outsole provides more traction during on and off-road activities, helping to stabilize your run. These slip-on shoes for trail running combine style and function to give you a good-looking trail shoe that performs just as well. Enjoy the comfort of fresh Foam and a versatile 8mm heel drop, with the powerful performance of data-driven at tread technology.
feature_bullets: Ultimate Off-Road shoe: make Off-Road running a smoother ride. The New Balance fresh Foam Crag trail running Shoe boasts data-driven technology and trail-specific features that bring speed and traction to any route

Fresh Foam midsole: these running shoes are built with fresh Foam midsole cushioning, precision engineered to deliver an ultra-cushioned, lightweight ride. One single piece of foam provides a plush feeling at every step

At TREAD outsole: made for any terrain, these trail running shoes feature a durable rubber outsole with at TREAD, which provides versatile traction during both on and off-road activities. This technology helps to stabilize your run

Bootie Construction: featuring a unique slip-on design with laces and a bootie construction, these cushioned running shoes let you customize your fit. Hugging your foot in all the right places, they provide a feeling that's snug and secure
8mm drop: these running shoes feature a heel-to-toe drop of approximately 8mm. Due to variances created during development and manufacturing processes, references to 8mm are approximate
